means: 努力（或艰难尝试）的成果

sentence.Network_en: Global ecological efforts can easily be at odds with local ecologies.
sentence.Network_cn: 全球性生态保护工作很可能会和地方生态系统存在矛盾。

sentence.Network_en: The company has made heroic efforts at cost reduction.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司在降低成本方面付出了艰苦卓绝的努力。

sentence.Network_en: Elaborate efforts were made to reconstruct what had happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 为重现当时的情景，他们做了大量细致的工作。

PerfectNetExp.abs: At Princeton , language teachers make special efforts to keep their subjects interesting ., 在普林斯顿大学 , 语文教师特别下功夫 , 使他们的课程增添趣味性.
百度词典搜索_自 ... 自理[ take care of or provide for oneself] 自力[ rely on one's own;efforts] 自恋[ narcissism].
He proposed to address this through described as increased efforts at nation - building ., 他建议通过加大国家建设的力度来解决这个问题.
At first , its efforts were mostly within the United States ., 开始 , 其主要致力于美国范围内.

list.abs: 马的介绍_百度知道 ... 马赫数[ Mach number] 马后炮[ belated effort] 马虎[ careless;negligent;skimping;sloppy].
急求常用的英语单词_百度知道 ... jogging 慢跑 joint effort 共同努力 lack 缺乏.
和管理(management efforts)上享有最高的优先.CPM客户抱怨比 (Complaint per Million)为公司产品质量验证的最高指针,包含自原料到 …
百度词典搜索_通 ... 通礼[ common etiquette] 通力[ concerted effort] 通例[ usual practice;established practice].

entry.def: If you make an effort to do something, you try very hard to do it.

example.ex: He made no effort to hide his disappointment...
Finding a cure requires considerable time and effort.
example.tran: 找到治疗的办法需要大量的时间和精力。

entry.def: If you say that someone did something with effort or with an effort, you mean it was difficult for them to do.

example.ex: She took a deep breath and sat up slowly and with great effort...
example.tran: 她深吸一口气，费力地慢慢坐起身来。

example.ex: With an effort she contained her irritation.

entry.tran: （为达到某一目的的）有组织的行动，一系列活动
entry.def: An effort is a particular series of activities that is organized by a group of people in order to achieve something.

example.tran: 在安哥拉进行的饥荒救济行动

entry.tran: 费力的事;困难的事;劳神的事
entry.def: If you say that something is an effort, you mean that an unusual amount of physical or mental energy is needed to do it.

example.ex: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
example.tran: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

entry.def: If you make the effort to do something, you do it, even though you need extra energy to do it or you do not really want to.

example.ex: I don't get lonely now because I make the effort to see people.
example.tran: 我现在不觉得孤独了，因为我尝试着与人交往。

entry.def: If you do something difficult or painful by an effort of will, you manage to make yourself do it.

example.ex: It was only by a supreme effort of will and courage that he was able to pull himself together.
example.tran: 他全凭超凡的决心和勇气才使自己振作起来。

entry.def: If you say that something is worth the effort, you mean that it will justify the energy that you have spent or will spend on it.

example.ex: Fortunately, the chore of leaf sweeping is well worth the effort.
example.tran: 幸运的是，干清扫落叶这个活儿是值得的。

auth_sentence.content: UN efforts have failed to break the political deadlock.
auth_sentence.res_content: UN efforts have failed to break the political deadlock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: UN efforts have failed to break the political deadlock.

auth_sentence.content: First, there are the efforts to restore power.
auth_sentence.res_content: First, there are the efforts to restore power.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: First, there are the efforts to restore power.

auth_sentence.content: His efforts caught the eye of the Obama campaign.
auth_sentence.res_content: His efforts caught the eye of the Obama campaign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His efforts caught the eye of the Obama campaign.

Sentence.sentence: It takes efforts to build each book," Maclnnis tells me.
It will force them to pull their efforts together
make efforts to reach agreement on their family budgets
It is a society well worth studying,and its efforts to conquer the gender gap impart a vital lesson—though not the lesson the Swedes had in mind。
Their solutions need joint efforts of the public and private sectors.
Thus, my IDP will be most effective when it's embedded in larger career-development efforts
